title: Carbon nanotubes alter agrosystem multifunctionality
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00195H, Paper
Mathieu Leroy, Vincent E. J. Jassey, Jerome Silvestre, Maialen Barret, Emmanuel Flahaut, Camille Larue
Since the discovery of the potential of carbon nanotubes (CNTs) in agriculture to improve crop yield, many studies have been conducted to understand which effects CNTs could have on agrosystem...
